entry.title: Nesher Bari - Data Preparation
entry.summary:
In the previous two parts of this series, we introduced the Nesher Bari project and dived into an Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) of one of the main datasets. In this post, I will walk through how we can prepare and clean the dataset, so it is ready for ingestion by an AI/ML model.

entry.title: Nesher Bari - Exploratory Data Analysis
entry.summary:
In the previous part of this series, we introduced the Nesher Bari project, which aims to build an ML solution to accelerate vulture conservation (see more details in Wildlife.ai’s website). In this post, we dive into more technical details and explore one of the main datasets in the project: the Ornitela dataset.
